title: Remo Sansonetti
summary: Remo Sansonetti (born 24 January 1946) is an Australian former cyclist. He competed at the 1972, 1976 and 1980 Summer Olympics. Sansonetti set the fastest time in the amateur Goulburn to Sydney Classic in 1979 run from Goulburn to Liverpool. He is a twin brother of Sal Sansonetti. The Sansonettis produced the bikes for the Australian team.
content:
Remo Sansonetti (born 24 January 1946) is an Australian former cyclist. He competed at the 1972, 1976 and 1980 Summer Olympics. Sansonetti set the fastest time in the amateur Goulburn to Sydney Classic in 1979 run from Goulburn to Liverpool. He is a twin brother of Sal Sansonetti. The Sansonettis produced the bikes for the Australian team.
